name: Rika
info:
• 别名: 리카
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: November 3rd
  • 血型: B
  • 身高: 159 cm
  • 体重: 46 kg
  • 年龄: 24(韩)
detail: Rika is a sub-character in Mystic Messenger who founded the RFA and was V's girlfriend and fiancee. V claims she committed suicide a year and half prior to the events of the game, although a body was never found and nobody witnessed her suicide.
